sentence: The poll also found that Kevin Rinke holds five percent of the vote, Tudor Dixon and Ryan Kelly have four percent, and Perry Johnson and Mike Brown hold three percent.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig Holds Wide Lead over Republican Rivals

sentence: Mike Brown; businesswomen Donna Brandeburg and Tudor Dixon; businessman Perry Johnson; real estate agent Ryan Kelley; financial advisor Michael Markey; pastor Ralph Rebandt, businessman Kevin Rinke; and chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Meatgrinder' GOP Gov. primary in Michigan will leave nominee broke, bloodied, and disliked': expert

sentence: Craig's suit, filed with the Michigan Court of Claims, is the second lawsuit filed following Oakland County businessman, Perry Johnson, who filed Friday.
author: Paul Egan
title: Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig files lawsuit over removal from August ballot
